is read-only or hidden. It simply does not work if it is directly in C:\

IContainer.getFile(IPath) throws an IllegalArgumentException which is not specified.

I have updated the spec of IContainer.getFile.  Old spec had the line:

The path of the resulting resource will have at least two segments.

To:

The path of the resulting resource must have at least two segments.

The "must" keyword clarifies that it is not legal to create a file handle with a
path that has less than two segments.

External files can have a path which has less segments than required by Platform
Core.
